Reviews.Title: “Great location!”

Reviews.Content: excellent location poor standard indeed uninviting looked furnished jumble sale dimly lit cold unable heating cold bathroom ok paddington station lots restaurants cafes nearby breakfast provided cheap sausages slow service wouldnt stay nicer hotels close

Reviews.Title: “Average Hotel, Good Location”
Reviews.Author: bygeorgew
Reviews.Content: booked canadian travel agency ok bit noisy lobby free wireless internet connection free positive reception soso breakfast plentiful location near paddington tube station convenient getting reception staff friendly helpfulthis hotel square hotels square looking cheap ok value elsewhere

Reviews.Title: “Good Location - Enjoyed Our Stay”
Reviews.Author: Cundy
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 6 nights situated quiet street lovely park front found clean size bed comfortable found staff helpful requests breakfast morning choice continental english enjoyable short 5 minute walk paddington station

Reviews.Title: “Good Value, Great Location - Would stay again!”
Reviews.Author: KatLM
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights found reception helpful checking wasnt ready arrived leave bags lobby secure luggage safe worry expecting sleep fine elevator 3rd floor initially unhappy elevator loud closing awake night troubles sleeping english breakfast nice continental selection expect cereal toast juice wireless internet sometimes friends 2nd floor lobby internet free whilst cut acceptable located near paddington station pleasant looking square found location couldnt considering price range definately reccommend stay
